mutants.code:
def longest_substring(s):
    max_length = 1
    char_set = set()
    left = 0
    for right in range(len(s)):
        while s[right] in char_set:
            char_set.remove(s[left])
            left += 1
        char_set.add(s[right])
        max_length = max(max_length, right - left + 1)
    return max_length

def longest_substring(s):
    max_length = -1
    char_set = set()
    left = 0
    for right in range(len(s)):
        while s[right] in char_set:
            char_set.remove(s[left])
            left += 1
        char_set.add(s[right])
        max_length = max(max_length, right - left + 1)
    return max_length

def longest_substring(s):
    max_length = 0
    char_set = set()
    left = 0
    for right in range(len(s)):
        while s[right] not in char_set:
            char_set.remove(s[left])
            left += 1
        char_set.add(s[right])
        max_length = max(max_length, right - left + 1)
    return max_length

    max_length = 0
    char_set = set()
    left = 0
    for right in range(len(s)):

            char_set.remove(s[left])
            left -= 1
        char_set.add(s[right])
        max_length = max(max_length, right - left + 1)

def longest_substring(s):
    max_length = 0
    char_set = set()
    left = 0
    for right in range(len(s)):
        while s[right] in char_set:
            char_set.remove(s[left])
            left += 1
        char_set.add(s[right])
        max_length = max(max_length, (right - left) * 1)
